title: Topic 005 Question 055
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure SQL Database logic server named SQL1 and an Azure virtual machine named VM1. VM1 uses a private IP address only.
The Firewall and virtual networks settings for SQL1 are shown in the following exhibit.
You need to ensure that VM1 can connect to SQL1. The solution must use the principle of least privilege.
options: Set Allow Azure services and resources to access this server to Yes.
